channel.title: Globals on www.mirkosertic.de
channel.description: Recent content in Globals on www.mirkosertic.de

item.title: Tools & Goodies
item.description: Technical stuff Dependency-Track Dependency-Track is an intelligent Component Analysis platform that allows organizations to identify and reduce risk in the software supply chain. Dependency-Track takes a unique and highly beneficial approach by leveraging the capabilities of Software Bill of Materials (SBOM). This approach provides capabilities that traditional Software Composition Analysis (SCA) solutions cannot achieve. OWASP CycloneDX OWASP CycloneDX is a lightweight Software Bill of Materials (SBOM) standard designed for use in application security contexts and supply chain component analysis.

item.title: My personal list of interesting books
item.description: General software engineering & project management The Mythical Man-Month. Essays on Software Engineering. Frederick P. Brooks Requirements-Engineering und -Management: Professionelle, iterative Anforderungsanalyse für die Praxis. Chris Rupp und die SOPHISTEN The Deadline: A Novel About Project Management. Tom DeMarco The Goal: A Process of Ongoing Improvement. Eliyahu M. Goldratt, Jeff Cox Peopleware: Productive Projects and Teams. Tom DeMarco 97 Things Every Programmer Should Know

item.title: My favorite postings
item.description: Here is a list of my favorite and evergreen postings so far: WebAssembly with vue.js Alice, Bob, Carol and Dave OpenCL Edition Object-Oriented WebAssembly Bytecoder : A Low Level Bytecode to JavaScript Transpiler A Domain-driven Design Example Improve Test Quality with Mutation Testing A JavaFX based Game Authoring System Why I switched to static HTML generators

item.title: Impressum
